SEARCH
Package service

Class MusicTrack

java.lang.Object
service.MusicTrack
public class MusicTrack extends Object
The MusicTrack class represents a track for notes in the game. It manages the spawning, movement, catching, and drawing of notes.

  • Constructor Details

    • MusicTrack

      public MusicTrack(NotePool notePool, int maxHitDistance, Image noteImage, int noteSize, int targetXPos, int targetYPos, int spawnDistance)
      Constructs a MusicTrack object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      notePool - the note pool to retrieve notes from
      maxHitDistance - the maximum distance for a successful hit
      noteImage - the image representing the note
      noteSize - the size of the note
      targetXPos - the x-coordinate of the target position
      targetYPos - the y-coordinate of the target position
      spawnDistance - the distance from where notes spawn
